# INSERT MAXLIK IN YOUR SYS PATH AND IMPORT IT

import os
import sys
from pathlib import Path

root = str(Path('~').expanduser())  # get your root path (C:\\Users\your_name)
sys.path.insert(0, root + "\PycharmProjects\Econometrics-Course\maxlik")  # add MaxLik path in your system (sys) path list
from maxlik import MaxLik  # now you can import MaxLik class

# old version
# sys.path.insert(0, os.path.abspath('PythonProjects\Econometrics-Course\maxlik'))
